channel.title: Client wont connect to server , or vice versa
channel.description:
either my client wont attempt to connect to my server , or my server wont accept connections from any clients , wtf have i done........
i can perfectly load up the client , but when i type my name and pass it says 'Error connecting to server' the server also seems to load properly , its just the connection that fails at me :eek:
any suggestions?

item.title: Client wont connect to server , or vice versa
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

either my client wont attempt to connect to my server , or my server wont accept connections from any clients , wtf have i done…

i can perfectly load up the client , but when i type my name and pass it says ‘Error connecting to server’
the server also seems to load properly , its just the connection that fails at me :eek:

any suggestions?
